name: Lend Me A Hand
description:
In a life without hands, you awaken to find yourself at the whim of a rogue artificial intelligence.  Something's wrong, and you can't quite put your finger on it. 

An Action/Adventure Shooter created by Light Sail VR for this VR Game Jam 2020. 

2D Assets & Art - Josh Helfferich 

3D Art & Design - Rocky Borders 

Programming Lead - Matthew Celia

Story - Robert Watts 

Music and SFX - Epidemic Sound
